column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Beautiful exhibits with helpful and friendly staff. Great place to dodge the cold and learn something new in downtown. It's a short walk away from Millennium Park
column2: it has interesting rotation exhibits from all around the world
column3: and there is definitely something for everyone. Got through what we wanted to see in a couple of hour's time (all that we had
column5: but you could have easily spent a half day-a full day in this museum
column6: depending on your interest in art. Would recommend! The membership seems like a lovely thing to have
column7: especially if you like modern and contemporary art.
